casebody.data:
J. Bradford ERB, Plaintiff Appellant, v. CLAREMONT LABORATORIES, Inc., and Capitol Machine Company, Inc., Defendants Appellees.* Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 3, 1928. No. 65. Henry Amerman, of New York City (J. B. Erb, of counsel), for appellant. C. P. Goepel, of New York City, for ap-pellees.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

Certiorari denied 49 S. Ct. 252, 73 L. Ed. —.

 PER CURIAM.

Deeree affirmed.
